```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r setting}
library(nivor)

set.seed(1)
matrix <- matrix(round(rexp(49) * 100, 0), 7, 7)
keys <- c("John", "Raoul", "Jane", "Marcel", "Ibrahim", "Junko", "Lyu")

common_settings <- list(
  width = 800,
  height = 400,
  margin = list(
    top = 60,
    right = 80,
    bottom = 60,
    left = 80
  ),
  xPadding = 0.2
)
```

## Default

In R, we use `do.call` to constructs and executes a function call from a name or a function and a list of arguments to be passed to it.

```{r default}
do.call(
  n_chord,
  n_options(
    matrix = matrix,
    keys = keys,
    default = common_settings
  )
)
```

## Radial Labels

```{r radial labels}
do.call(
  n_chord,
  n_options(
    matrix = matrix,
    keys = keys,
    labelRotation = -90,
    default = common_settings
  )
)
```

## Custom Labels Text

```{r custom labels text}
do.call(
  n_chord,
  n_options(
    matrix = matrix,
    keys = keys,
    label = htmlwidgets::JS("d => `${d.id} [${d.value}]`"),
    default = common_settings
  )
)
```

## Angle Padding

```{r angle padding}
do.call(
  n_chord,
  n_options(
    matrix = matrix,
    keys = keys,
    labelRotation = -90,
    padAngle = 0.06,
    default = common_settings
  )
)
```

## Ribbons Offset

```{r ribbons offset}
do.call(
  n_chord,
  n_options(
    matrix = matrix,
    keys = keys,
    labelRotation = -90,
    padAngle = 0.02,
    innerRadiusOffset = 0.02,
    default = common_settings
  )
)
```

## Alternative Colors

```{r alternative colors}
do.call(
  n_chord,
  n_options(
    matrix = matrix,
    keys = keys,
    labelRotation = -90,
    padAngle = 0.02,
    innerRadiusOffset = 0.02,
    colors = list(
      scheme = "category10"
    ),
    default = common_settings
  )
)
```

## Putting Labels Inside Arcs

```{r putting labels inside arcs}
do.call(
  n_chord,
  n_options(
    matrix = matrix,
    keys = keys,
    padAngle = 0.02,
    innerRadiusRation = 0.8,
    innerRadiusOffset = 0.02,
    labelOffset = -30,
    labelTextColor = list(
      from = "color",
      modifiers = list(
        c("darker", 1.6)
      )
    ),
    default = common_settings
  )
)
```
